per_task.explanation: I start from the prior P(H)=0.6. I update using the provided likelihoods P(E|H) and P(E|¬H) via Bayes' rule. This yields posterior P(H|E)≈0.8710.
I start from the prior P(H)=0.01. I update using the provided likelihoods P(E|H) and P(E|¬H) via Bayes' rule. This yields posterior P(H|E)≈0.1610.
I start from the prior P(H)=0.3. I update using the provided likelihoods P(E|H) and P(E|¬H) via Bayes' rule. This yields posterior P(H|E)≈0.5000.
